name: Woof Meow Animal Hospital
summary:
Become a Veterinarian and Help Out Injured and Sick Pets!
The player works for an animal hospital that specializes in cats and dogs, where they will work alongside the kind hospital director and senior doctors to treat the injured and sick pets that come to the hospital each day. Dialogue scenes are partly-voiced, adding a greater sense of individuality to each character.
